title: Goomba

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Headbonk**: Deal a Basic attack to your target and learn who they visited and got visited by, if they survive, also learn your target's role.
- **Stay Put**: Attack everyone that visits you.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You will die if you get hit by a Basic attack.

desc:
Post 1356
*Goombas are what you'd call "small fries." Actually, they're pretty much the smallest fries.*
